fields.longtext:
Hi there, I'm Ridwan, also known as ridwaanhall. an aspiring Informatics currently pursuing my undergraduate degree at the University of Technology Yogyakarta. Although I don't have professional work experience yet, I'm an eager learner looking to launch my career.

Throughout my studies, I've developed skills in Python, Flask, Django, MongoDB, Git, and more. I'm particularly passionate about leveraging my Python expertise to work on generative AI, NLP applications, neural networks, data analysis, and other emerging technologies.

With my academic coursework and personal projects under my belt, I'm excited to tackle new challenges that will allow me to grow as a developer. I'm a team player ready to build innovative solutions that drive value and user experiences forward.
